Bob, Decatur Il Frequently Bought Together - This Item: GEROPROTECT® Longevity A.I., 30 softgels [GEROPROTECT® Stem Cell](/vitamins-supplements/item02401/geroprotect-stem-cell), capsules What Is Geroprotect Longevity AI? Longevity A.I. is a collaboration between Life Extension® and Insilico Medicine Inc. This innovative formula activates many of the same anti-aging pathways as calorie-restricted diets. It supports healthy cell and protein function, youthful gene expression and much more. Longevity A.I. uses artificial intelligence from Insilico Medicine, Inc. to create a state-of-the-art longevity supplement. GEROPROTECT® Longevity A.I. Benefits - Contains compounds which together support many of the healthy aging benefits similar to calorie-restrictive diets - Supports stem cell health, healthy molecular integrity & cell metabolism - Encourages healthy inflammatory response & youthful gene expression - Helps the body maintain protein homeostasis & adapt to stress Synergistic Ingredients Withaferin A, gamma-linolenic acid and ginsenoside Rg3 all promote healthy cell metabolism. Gamma-linolenic acid with withaferin A help to maintain a youthful and natural stress response. And gamma-linolenic acid together with ginsenoside Rg3 are powerful inhibitors that support a healthy inflammatory response and contribute to healthy stem cell activity. Product Transparency 40 years of research dedicated to bringing you premium, scientifically-validated formulations. Calorie restriction has been shown to enhance lifespan in some pre-clinical models, but it is difficult to adhere to. That's why we created GEROPROTECT® Longevity A.I., which can mimic the benefits of calorie restriction.
